# TASK::IS_CONTROLLED_VEHICLE_UNABLE_TO_GET_TO_ROAD

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex

## Returns
* **BOOL**: true - Ped has a TASK_CONTROL_VEHICLE and the controlled vehicle is currently unable to find a valid route to go back to road

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns true if the vehicle controlled by the ped is currently unable to find a valid route to go back to road
